type.desc: Set the data transformation type to join, similar to SQL's join, that is, to cross-query two data sources

key.desc: The field corresponding to the unique identifier of the original data, supporting the format a.b

fields.desc:
Type: string[]

Fields to query for the data to be transformed

values.desc:
Type: string[]

Fields to query in the source data

default.desc: Default value used when data is missing
